description: Azula is a cunning strategist, leading the superior army of the Firenation. She keeps her fortress well defended and if she decides to attack she will not be satisfied until even the last building is set aflame.
taunt_1: If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all - I will snuff it out!
taunt_2: You are not a challenge, you're a tease.
taunt_4: I will not hesitate to bring you down!
anger_2: Do you really want to fight me?
plead: I'm done. I know when I'm beaten. You got me.
nervous_2: Well, what choice do I have?! Trust is for fools, fear is the only reliable way!
victory_2: Afraid of fire I see. That's good, you should be.
victory_3: Don't flatter yourself, you were never even a player.
request: Maybe you should worry less about the tides (of destiny) who already made up their mind up about killing you and worry more about me, who is still mulling it over.
thanks: I wanted to thank you for your help.
congrats: You and I will be the stroungest couple in the entire world, we will dominate the earth!
extra: Yes, we defeated you for all time, you will never rise from this shame and humiliation!
kick_player: Hmmm, I am not good enough for you? You are hurting my feelings.
siege: Huh, sounds like the firebending is back on!
sent: I still haven't heard my thank you.
team_losing: Well, what choice do I have?! Trust is for fools, fear is the only reliable way!
will_attack: There will be no place left to hide.
